reviewText: I ordered this item.  It was advertised as a DVD with the DVD logo.  It was in DVD-R format which would not run in my Sony DVD Player.  Amazon's company "CreateSpace" at first refused to give me a refund.  Would never use them again.
Burn in was no better after I used the product as directed.  Gave it lots of tries.  May not be the fault of the product, my burn in is very bad.
